-e ---

Proto-Indo-European *bʰúHt, from *bʰuH-.

𒁈 preike(stuhl) barack ⇔ baut 𓉧𓉨𓊅
𒅁𒉌 ib.ni bauen build ≠ ebenen √bau
𒂍 𒂍𒊒 pit-ru | pit-raw plot “(mythical) unbuilt plot, waste space”
𓅙 𓃀 𓏏 𓊌 brick ⲧⲱⲃⲉ tōbe ጡብ ṭub طُوبَة ṭūba 𑐀𑐟𑐥𑐵 atapā adobe tubali tube > τούβλο toúvlo = Tölpel (blockhead) ☑

󳂊 󳂋 󳂌 󳂍 󳂎 󳂏 󳂐 bauer builder

󴆋

𒁁𒆷𒋾𒊏 be-la-ti-ra builder! ढ़ई baṛhaī.ter वर्धकि ᵇvardhaki "carpenter"

𒀊𒋾𒅅𒈠 bautiq.me 𓀨 √patāqu build 𓊅

𒁀𒌋 𒁇𒁺 ba-u; bar-du "road" Bau™ via part path ⇔ 𒄷𒋼 route road

𓊅 bauen as verb:
Arabic بَنَى (banā) (بني (bny) root) : Hebrew בָּנָה (banah) [to posses, to build] with Sanskrit वनति (vanati) [to build, to make] : Avestan 𐬬𐬀𐬥𐬀𐬌𐬙𐬌 (vanaiti) [to establish, to make]

𒁀𒉡 ba-nu •bon ب و ن
𒁀𒉡 good, to be(come) good, beautiful

𒁀𒉡 ba-nu •bauen bau ب ن ي
𒁀𒉡 build, to create, creator, engender, begetter, brick mold

𒅁𒁀𒌓 ibatu abbau, beat "destroy"

bygger builder
bâtisseux builder
בַּנַּאי banai •Bauner builder

𒁀𒉡 ba-nu •bauen
𒁀𒉡 to create

𒁀𒁍 ba-bu
𒁀𒁍 door, gate

⇔ ben, bin … son, offspring

𓊅 wohnen as verb: 𐌱𐌰𐌿𐌰𐌽 bauan, búa, bo *būaną. (dwell) ☑ ⇔ ναίω bunaíō
𓊅 wohnen as verb: *wunāną, from Proto-Indo-European *wenh₁- “to wish, love”. [KF:doubtful/WTF] ⇔ dwell

𒀀𒂵 a-ga •ago "rear" #arkatu ≈
𒀀𒁀 a-ba •Anbau "a building or a part of a building"

𓐪 𓂧 𓏌 𓀢 𓀜 | build, fashion (men) | builder
𓊪 𓏏 𓎛 | “create” |potah pyutk-@Tocharian бүтээх büteekh πλάθω plátho ဖန်တီး hpanti
𓊪 𓏏 𓎛 | “create” |potah ဖန်တီး hpanti 𒁀𒉡 ba-nu banu •bauen बनाना banānā បង្ក bɑngkɑɑ ဖန် hpan
